short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: memosnag is used to capture image and video data and urls and text from page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: the memosnag extension is the easiest way to save anything on the internet. Images, text, screenshots, websites, YouTube, Dailymotion and Vimeo videos, social media posts, and more. Everything you snag is saved in your memosnag account where can create and share collections of your favorite content. Memosnag is a better alternative to bookmarks and other similar services for saving online content like Evernote Clipper, Pinterest and Pocket.
